listitem.para: -2 - Connection Timeout (the was exceeded before a TCP connection could be established)

-3 - Transfer Timeout (the was exceeded before the last byte was received). The retcode_pv may be set to 200 or 0, depending whether a 200 OK was received or not. If it was, the body_pv will contain partially downloaded data, use at your own risk! (we recommend you only use this data for logging / debugging purposes)
-4 - Already Connecting (another Marina.Rodeo worker is already connecting to this URL hostname. Consult for more info).
-10 - Internal Error (out of memory, unexpected libcurl error, etc.)
